title: EEAS: High Representative Josep Borrell announces senior nominations | EEAS
snippet: Josep Borrell, High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy/Vice-President of the European Commission also announces the nomination of two Heads of Delegation of the European Union.

title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. title: High Representative Josep Borrell announces senior EEAS nominations – INSIGHT EU MONITORING
snippet: He is currently serving as the Deputy Managing Director for Global Issues, and before that as Head of Cabinet of former European Commissioner Pierre Moscovici, responsible for Economy, Financial matters, Taxation and Customs. Mr. BAILLY will take up his duties on 1 January 2025.
